construction.intro: For construction, we offer specific solutions: lead capture via Google Maps, automated quote follow-ups, and post-project review requests.
construction.services:
Our construction automations include:
• Google Maps scraping for new projects
• Automated bid monitoring
• Scheduled quote follow-ups
• Post-project satisfaction emails
• Automatic Google review requests
construction.leads: For construction leads, we use Google Maps scraping to identify ongoing projects and companies hiring. We can also monitor public bids automatically.

ecommerce.intro: For e-commerce, we're Klaviyo and Shopify experts. Our automated flows recover 5-15% of abandoned carts and generate an average of $42 for every $1 invested.
ecommerce.services:
Our e-commerce automations include:
• Abandoned cart recovery (3 emails)
• Welcome series for new customers
• Post-purchase flows for retention
• Automatic back-in-stock alerts
• RFM segmentation
• Winback for dormant customers
ecommerce.leads: For e-commerce, "leads" are your visitors. We set up complete tracking, smart popups, and conversion flows to turn visitors into buyers.

b2b.intro: For B2B, we focus on automatic lead qualification, lead scoring, and nurturing sequences to convert cold prospects into customers.
b2b.services:
Our B2B automations include:
• Automatic lead scoring
• Nurturing sequences (5-10 emails)
• CRM sync (HubSpot, Pipedrive)
• Real-time sales alerts
• Automatic lead qualification
b2b.leads: For B2B lead generation, we configure capture workflows from LinkedIn, web forms, and automatically qualify based on your criteria. Hot leads trigger instant alerts.

saas.intro: For SaaS, we configure automated onboarding, churn prevention, and feature adoption emails to maximize retention.
saas.services:
Our SaaS automations include:
• Sequenced onboarding
• Churn prevention (at-risk users)
• Feature adoption emails
• Automatic NPS surveys
• Smart upsell triggers

services.intro: For service providers, we configure prospecting automation, appointment reminders, and post-mission testimonial requests.
services.services:
Our services automations include:
• Automated prospecting
• Long-cycle lead nurturing
• Appointment reminders
• Testimonial requests
• Automatic invoicing
